Professional & Employability Skills

This module is designed to equip students with essential skills for personal and professional development. Through a combination of individual and group activities, students will develop strong written and oral communication abilities using various techniques and technologies. They will create a Personal Development Plan (PDP), applying critical thinking to support their growth as life-long learners. Additionally, students will enhance their cognitive skills, enabling them to effectively access, organize, analyze, and critically evaluate information necessary for managing organizations.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Demonstrate competence in the use of written and oral communication skills, both as an individual and in group settings, employing a range of techniques and technologies. [Communication, Learning]

+  Create a Personal Development Plan. [Learning, Reflection]

+  Understand the process of Critical thinking and employ that process to support the Personal Development Plan and personal development as a life-long learner. [Analysis]

+  Demonstrate competence in the use of cognitive skills in the process of accessing organizing analyzing and critically evaluating information useful for the management of organizations. [Application, Learning]
